If the guy doesn't find out one way or another, either being a useless smuck who can only watch in horror or the kind of guy who will kick the shit out of the other guy or otherwise take her back, it feels like the story quits before it climaxes.

That way she can enjoy having sex with the other dude and the ex is free to find another woman for him, win-win situation in my opinion.
